verses.verse: A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>. Unto thee, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, do I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
O my God <S%H430><s%>, I trust <S%H982><s%> in thee: let me not be ashamed <S%H954><s%>, let not mine enemies <S%H341><s%> triumph <S%H5970><s%> over me.
Yea, let none that wait <S%H6960><s%> on thee be ashamed <S%H954><s%>: let them be ashamed <S%H954><s%> which transgress <S%H898><s%> without cause <S%H7387><s%>.
Shew <S%H3045><s%> me thy ways <S%H1870><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>; teach <S%H3925><s%> me thy paths <S%H734><s%>.

Lead <S%H1869><s%> me in thy truth <S%H571><s%>, and teach <S%H3925><s%> me: for thou art the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation <S%H3468><s%>; on thee do I wait <S%H6960><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, thy tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> and thy lovingkindnesses <S%H2617><s%>; for they have been ever of old <S%H5769><s%>. tender: Heb. bowels

Remember <S%H2142><s%> not the sins <S%H2403><s%> of my youth <S%H5271><s%>, nor my transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: according to thy mercy <S%H2617><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> thou me for thy goodness' <S%H2898><s%> sake, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
Good <S%H2896><s%> and upright <S%H3477><s%> is the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: therefore will he teach <S%H3384><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>.
The meek <S%H6035><s%> will he guide <S%H1869><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%>: and the meek <S%H6035><s%> will he teach <S%H3925><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>.
All the paths <S%H734><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> unto such as keep <S%H5341><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> and his testimonies <S%H5713><s%>.
For thy name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, pardon <S%H5545><s%> mine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; for it is great <S%H7227><s%>.
What man <S%H376><s%> is he that feareth <S%H3373><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>? him shall he teach <S%H3384><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> that he shall choose <S%H977><s%>.
His soul <S%H5315><s%> shall dwell <S%H3885><s%> at ease <S%H2896><s%>; and his seed <S%H2233><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>. dwell: Heb. lodge in goodness

The secret <S%H5475><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is with them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him; and he will shew <S%H3045><s%> them his covenant <S%H1285><s%>. and: or, and his covenant to make them know it
Mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> are ever <S%H8548><s%> toward the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; for he shall pluck <S%H3318><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> out of the net <S%H7568><s%>. pluck: Heb. bring forth
Turn <S%H6437><s%> thee unto me, and have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me; for I am desolate <S%H3173><s%> and afflicted <S%H6041><s%>.
The troubles <S%H6869><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%> are enlarged <S%H7337><s%>: O bring thou me out <S%H3318><s%> of my distresses <S%H4691><s%>.
Look <S%H7200><s%> upon mine affliction <S%H6040><s%> and my pain <S%H5999><s%>; and forgive <S%H5375><s%> all my sins <S%H2403><s%>.
Consider <S%H7200><s%> mine enemies <S%H341><s%>; for they are many <S%H7231><s%>; and they hate <S%H8130><s%> me with cruel <S%H2555><s%> hatred <S%H8135><s%>. cruel: Heb. hatred of violence
O keep <S%H8104><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> me: let me not be ashamed <S%H954><s%>; for I put my trust <S%H2620><s%> in thee.
Let integrity <S%H8537><s%> and uprightness <S%H3476><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> me; for I wait <S%H6960><s%> on thee.
Redeem <S%H6299><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, out of all his troubles <S%H6869><s%>.
